wikipedia_page.main: The Hon. Charles Pearson (born 5 March 1956) is the younger son of the 3rd Viscount Cowdray and owner of Dunecht estate in Aberdeenshire.

response: Charles Pearson (1793–1862) was Solicitor to the City of London and promoter of London's first underground railway.
Charles Pearson may also refer to:
* Charles Pearson, Lord Pearson (1843–1910), Scottish politician and judge
* Charles Pearson (British Army officer) (1834–1909), British colonel in the Zulu war
